invesco india - invesco global equity in.benchmark_index: MSCI World Index - Net Total Return
asset_allocation: Expense Ratio of Underlying Scheme, Invesco
IDCW - Income Distribution cum capital withdrawal option.

invesco india gold etf fund of fund.investment_objective: To provide returns that closely corresponds to returns provided by Invesco India Gold Exchange Traded Fund. There is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
invesco india gold etf fund of fund.minimum_investment: R1,000/- & in multiples of R1/- thereafter
invesco india gold etf fund of fund.additional_purchase: R1,000/- & in multiples of(cid:3) R1/- thereafter
asset_allocation: Expense Ratio of Underlying Scheme, Invesco
IDCW - Income Distribution cum capital withdrawal option.

invesco india gold exchange traded fund.investment_objective: To generate returns that closely correspond to the returns provided by investment in physical gold in the domestic market, subject to tracking error. There is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
invesco india gold exchange traded fund.load: Exit Load1 Nil(cid:3) (For redemption in Creation Unit size.)
invesco india gold exchange traded fund.minimum_investment: 1.1 On Exchange : 1 Unit Directly with Mutual Fund : 1,000 Units and in multiples thereof. Large Investors can subscribe / redeem directly with AMC for the amount greater than Rs. 25 Crores. Except for Schemes managed by Employee Provident Fund Organisation, India and Recognised Provident Funds, approved gratuity funds and approved superannuation funds under Income tax act, 1961 (till February 28, 2025)
tracking_error: Based on 3 years, monthly data points

invesco india nifty 50 exchange traded f.investment_objective: To generate returns which closely correspond to the returns generated by securities as represented by Nifty 50, subject to tracking error, if any. There is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
invesco india nifty 50 exchange traded f.load: Exit Load1, 1.1 Nil(cid:3) (For redemption in Creation Unit size.)
invesco india nifty 50 exchange traded f.minimum_investment: 1.2 On Exchange : 1 Unit Directly with Mutual Fund : For Market Maker - 5,000 Units and in multiples thereof. Large Investors can subscribe / redeem directly with AMC for the amount greater than Rs. 25 Crores. Except for Schemes managed by Employee Provident Fund Organisation, India and Recognised Provident Funds, approved gratuity funds and approved superannuation funds under Income tax act, 1961 (till February 28, 2025)
tracking_error: Based on 3 years, monthly data points
